text: Newton, officially the Town of Newton, is an incorporated municipality located in Sussex County, New Jersey, United States. It is about by road northwest of New York City.Directions from New York City Center, 131 W 55th St, New York, NY 10019 to 23 Maple Ave, Newton, NJ 07860, Google Maps. Accessed July 11, 2017. As of the 2020 United States Census, the town's population was 8,374. ==References== Category:Towns in New Jersey Category:County seats in New Jersey
title: Newton, New Jersey
